flavor_text_entries.x:
These Pokémon are created when
spirits possess rotten tree stumps.
They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
flavor_text_entries.y:
According to old tales, these Pokémon are
stumps possessed by the spirits of
children who died while lost in the forest.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
These Pokémon are created when
spirits possess rotten tree stumps.
They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
According to old tales, these Pokémon are
stumps possessed by the spirits of
children who died while lost in the forest.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
These Pokémon are stumps possessed by the
spirits of children who died in the forest.
Their cries sound like eerie screams.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
According to legend, medicine to cure any illness
can be made by plucking the green leaves on its
head, brewing them, and boiling down the liquid.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
By imitating the voice of a child, it causes
people to get hopelessly lost deep in the forest.
It’s trying to make friends with them.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
An unknown spirit came to lodge in a tree
stump, creating this Pokémon. A cure-all can be
made from an infusion of its green leaves.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
After a lost child perished in the forest, their
spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit’s
rebirth as this Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.
